Name: hyperekplexia 2
Definition: A hyperekplexia that has_material_basis_in compound heterozygous or homozygous mutation in the GLRB gene on chromosome 4q32.

Name: hyperekplexia 3
Definition: A hyperekplexia that has_material_basis_in  homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the SLC6A5 gene on chromosome 11p15.

Name: hyperekplexia 4
Definition: A hyperekplexia that is characterized by extreme hypertonia
Synonym: multiple joint dislocations-short stature-craniofacial dysmorphism-congenital heart defects syndrome
